author: Valerie Bauerlein
title: South Carolina Prison Fights Leave 7 Dead and 17 Injured
text:
Seven inmates were killed and 17 others injured in a series of fights at a rural South Carolina prison, the latest incident in a prison system that officials say is dangerously understaffed.
The fights at Lee Correctional Institution in Bishopville began at 7:15 p.m. Sunday and lasted until 2:55 a.m. Monday, according to the stateâ€™s Department of Corrections. No employees or law-enforcement officers were injured, the department said. Emergency workers from a half-dozen regional agencies assisted in treating the injured inmates,...
